com.agsimeonov.flogger.backend.fluentd

Class SystemPropertiesRemoteSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agsimeonov.flogger.backend.fluentd.SystemPropertiesRemoteSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FluentdRemoteSettings

    public class SystemPropertiesRemoteSettings
extends Object
implements FluentdRemoteSettings
    Configures remote fluentd loggers via system proprties.

    To configure set the following system properties (also see FluentdBackendFactory):

    • flogger.remote_settings=com.agsimeonov.flogger.backend.fluentd.SystemPropertiesFluentdRemoteLoggerSettings#getInstance.
    • flogger.fluentd_host=<fluentd_host>.
    • flogger.fluentd_port=<fluentd_port>.

      • getInstance

        public static FluentdRemoteSettings getInstance()

      • getHost

        public String getHost()
        Acquires the Fluentd host using a system property. Fallbacks to localhost.

        To configure set the following:

        • flogger.fluentd_host=<fluentd_host>.

        Specified by:
        getHost in interface FluentdRemoteSettings
        Returns:
        the Fluentd host based on a system property, fallbacks to localhost.

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Acquires the Fluentd port using a system property. Fallbacks to 24224.

        To configure set the following:

        • flogger.fluentd_port=<fluentd_port>.

        Specified by:
        getPort in interface FluentdRemoteSettings
        Returns:
        the Fluentd port based on a system property, fallbacks to 24224.
